snippet: American sanctions make charitable giving to Iran slow and complicated, but the Obama administration has promised to speed applications for donations to help victims of recent earthquakes.
abstract: Obama administration promises to speed applications for donations to help Iran's earthquake victims after prospective donors express concern over whether American sanctions have made charitable giving to Iran slow and complicated.
lead_paragraph: American sanctions make charitable giving to Iran slow and complicated, but the Obama administration has promised to speed applications for donations to help victims of recent earthquakes.

headline.seo: U.S. Vows to Speed Aid to Iran Earthquake Victims
headline.main: U.S. Vows to Speed Aid to Iran Earthquake Victims
headline.print_headline: U.S. Vows Quick Action on Help for Iran
